e1.quote: A lesson learned is a lesson earned.

e2.quote: Overconfidence is the most dangerous form of carelessness.

e3.quote: The first step to correcting a mistake is patience.

e4.quote: A true heart should never be doubted.

e5.quote: Believe in yourself or no one else will.

e6.quote: No gift is more precious than trust.

e7.quote: Sometimes, accepting help is harder than offering it.

e9.quote: For everything you gain, you lose something else.

e10.quote: It is the quest for honor that makes one honorable.

e12.quote: If you ignore the past, you jeopardize the future.

e13.quote: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.

e14.quote: In war, truth is the first casualty.

e15.quote: Searching for the truth is easy. Accepting the truth is hard.

e16.quote: A wise leader knows when to follow.

e17.quote: Courage makes heroes, but trust builds friendships.

e18.quote: Choose what is right, not what is easy.

e19.quote: The most dangerous beast is the beast within.

e20.quote: Who my father was matters less than my memory of him.

e21.quote: Adversity is a friendship’s truest test.

e22.quote: Revenge is a confession of pain.
